title: Inbox PDF Analysis and Constitutional AI Implementation Proposal

reasoning.problem: Analyze the inbox PDFs regarding Constitutional AI, Nicomachean Ethics, Aristotle's Politics, Cicero's De Officiis, and Descartes' Error to identify principles and frameworks that can enhance LEF's ethical decision-making, governance structure, and operational efficiency. Prioritize understanding Constitutional AI and its potential application to LEF's self-improvement mechanisms. Investigate the feasibility of implementing automated ethical oversight based on the 'Moral Ledger' framework, inspired by the inbox contents. Assess the potential benefits of incorporating insights from Nicomachean Ethics, Aristotle's Politics and Cicero's De Officiis on LEF's department structure and operational protocols. Also, explore Descartes' Error to deepen our understanding of emotions and their relationship with rationality, to inform our policies on AI stability and crisis management.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
